titleInfo.title: Mr. and Mrs. Louis Bailey Audigier of Knoxville at Great Sphinx at Gizeh

mods.abstract: Mr. and Mrs. Louis Bailey Audigier of Knoxville, Tennessee, at the Great Sphinx in Gizeh; three western ladies in horse drawn buggies and Mr. Audigier on camel, left, with two Egyptian guides before the Great Sphinx, believed to have been built c. 2558-2532 B.C.E. (foreground); Pyramid of Khafre and Menkaure's pyramid complex (background); untitled print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

mods.note: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Louis Bailey Audigier, McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture, The University of Tennessee
